error.name: BUFFERTOOSMALL
error.description: a provided buffer is too small

error.name: COULDNOTLOADLIBRARY
error.description: the library could not be loaded

error.name: COULDNOTFINDLIBRARYEXPORT
error.description: a required exported symbol could not be found in the library

error.name: INCOMPATIBLEBINARYVERSION
error.description: the version of the binary interface does not match the bindings interface

method.name: Configure
method.description: Configures a driver with its specific configuration data.

method.name: GetName
method.description: returns the name identifier of the driver

method.name: GetType
method.description: returns the type identifier of the driver

method.name: GetVersion
method.description: returns the version identifiers of the driver

method.name: QueryParameters
method.description: Updates the driver parameters in the driver environment. Should only be called in the driver thread.

method.name: QueryParametersEx
method.description: Updates the driver parameters in the driver environment. Might be called out of thread. Implementation MUST be able to handle parallel calls.

class.name: EulerConnection
class.description: A connection to the Euler Service

method.name: Disconnect
method.description: Disconnects the connection. No further call can be handled after.

method.name: GetIdentifier
method.description: Returns the connection identifier.

method.name: GetApplicationName
method.description: Returns the application name.

method.name: GetApplicationVersion
method.description: Returns the application version.

method.name: GetBaseURL
method.description: Returns the base URL.

method.name: GetAPIKey
method.description: Returns the API Key.

method.name: GetDeviceID
method.description: Returns the DeviceID.

method.name: StartHeartBeat
method.description: Starts the heartbeat.

method.name: StopHeartBeat
method.description: Stops the heartbeat.

method.name: CreateBuild
method.description: Creates a new build job.

method.name: UploadImage
method.description: Uploads an image to a build job.

method.name: SetJobStatus
method.description: Updates a Job's status

class.name: Driver_Euler
class.description: A Driver for the Euler Service.

method.name: SetCustomSDKResource
method.description: Sets the machine resource name of the LibEuler SDK to load. MUST be called before Connect or it has no effect.

param.name: ResourceName
param.description: Resource name of core machine package. Empty means standard naming applies.

method.name: SetApplicationDetails
method.description: Sets the application details. Will be used for subsequent connections.

method.name: Connect
method.description: Creates a Euler Connection.

param.name: Identifier
param.description: Identifier for the connection. Fails if identifier is already existing.

method.name: ConnectWithLicenseData
method.description: Creates a Euler Connection from a license file data.

param.name: Identifier
param.description: Identifier for the connection. Fails if identifier is already existing.

method.name: ConnectWithLicenseResource
method.description: Creates a Euler Connection from a license file resource.

param.name: Identifier
param.description: Identifier for the connection. Fails if identifier is already existing.

method.name: FindConnection
method.description: Finds a connection. Fails if connection does not exist.

param.name: Identifier
param.description: Identifier for the connection. Fails if identifier is already existing.

method.name: ConnectionExists
method.description: Checks if a connection exists with a certain identifier.

param.name: Exists
param.description: Returns true, if the connection exists, false otherwise.

method.name: CloseAllConnections
method.description: Closes all connections.

method.name: GetVersion
method.description: retrieves the binary version of this library.

param.name: Major
param.description: returns the major version of this library

param.name: Minor
param.description: returns the minor version of this library

param.name: Micro
param.description: returns the micro version of this library

method.name: GetLastError
method.description: Returns the last error recorded on this object

param.name: HasError
param.description: Is there a last error to query

method.name: ReleaseInstance
method.description: Releases shared ownership of an Instance

method.name: AcquireInstance
method.description: Acquires shared ownership of an Instance

method.name: InjectComponent
method.description: Injects an imported component for usage within this component

param.name: SymbolAddressMethod
param.description: Address of the SymbolAddressMethod of the injected component

method.name: GetSymbolLookupMethod
method.description: Returns the address of the SymbolLookupMethod

method.name: CreateDriver
method.description: Creates a driver instance with a specific name.

param.name: Name
param.description: Name of driver to be created.

param.name: Type
param.description: Type of driver to be created.
